sentences.sentence: What's important at this juncture is the ability of the three republics to work together.

sentences.sentence: I feel entitled at this juncture, at this time, to claim the aid of all.
sentences.translation: 此时，在这个危急关头，我觉得我有权要求各方面的支持。
